Chooses a card to play from the AI's hand based on the total values of the collected cards.
chooseCard(Parade) - Method in class com.paradegame.ai.MediumAI
Chooses a card to play from the AI's hand based on the total values of the collected cards.
chooseDiscards(List<Card>, List<Player>) - Method in class com.paradegame.ai.AIPlayer
Abstract method for the AI to choose cards to discard from its hand.
chooseDiscards(List<Card>, List<Player>) - Method in class com.paradegame.ai.EasyAI
Chooses two cards with the highest values to discard from the AI's hand.
chooseDiscards(List<Card>, List<Player>) - Method in class com.paradegame.ai.HardAI
Chooses two cards to discard from the AI's hand to minimise the total value of the collected cards.
chooseDiscards(List<Card>, List<Player>) - Method in class com.paradegame.ai.MediumAI
Chooses two cards to discard from the AI's hand to minimise the total value of the collected cards.
Colour - Enum Class in com.paradegame.model
Represents the six colours of cards in the Parade game.
com.paradegame - package com.paradegame
 
com.paradegame.ai - package com.paradegame.ai
This package contains classes related to the AI logic of the game, including how different AI players choose cards to play and discard cards.
com.paradegame.controller - package com.paradegame.controller
This package contains the GameController Class which is responsible for controlling the game flow.
com.paradegame.model - package com.paradegame.model
This package contains the core game model classes, including Card, Colour, Deck, GameState, Parade and Player which define the fundamental components of the game.
com.paradegame.util - package com.paradegame.util
This package contains the Config class that loads game properties for the Parade game.
com.paradegame.view - package com.paradegame.view
This package contains classes responsible for the user interface, including CardDisplayer, ConsoleView, and InputHandler which manage card presentation, game state display and user input handling.
compareTo(Card) - Method in class com.paradegame.model.Card
Compares this card to another card based on their values.
Config - Class in com.paradegame.util
The Config class loads configuration settings from a properties file and provides utility methods to retrieve values for different types (String, int, boolean).

ConsoleView - Class in com.paradegame.view
The ConsoleView class is responsible for displaying the game state and user prompts to the console.

Constructs a ConsoleView instance, initialising the CardDisplayer.
